name: 234-28  cinnamon beanie
notes:
knitted hat in drops lima. the piece is worked bottom up, with stocking stitch and double edge. pattern li-144; yarn group b

**sizes**: s/m – m/l
fits head-size: 54/56 – 56/58 cm.

**materials**:
drops lima from garnstudio
150-150 g colour 9024, almond.

**needles**:
drops circular needle size 3.5 mm, length 40 cm.
drops double pointed needles size 3.5 mm.
the technique magic loop can be used; you then only need a circular needle, length 80 cm.

**knitting tension**:
22 stitches in width and 30 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
